## Description {#details}

This pass does misc.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> optimizations on IR before instruction selection.

<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsNegative)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Same as for 1.0, but expand the sign out of the constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -1 / x -&gt; rcp (fneg x)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsNegative)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Src = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ae44006b91094939f6ea72655e8312504">CreateFNeg</a>(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The rcp instruction doesn&#39;t support denormals, so scale the input</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out of the denormal range and convert at the end.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expand as 2^-n &#42; (1.0 / (x &#42; 2^n))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Skip scaling if input is known never denormal and the input</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// range won&#39;t underflow to denormal. The hard part is knowing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result. We need a range check, the result could be denormal for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0x1p+126 &lt; den &lt;= 0x1p+127.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;FrexpMant, FrexpExp&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ada0bab36c5ec58b16a657a0ec09cb641">getFrexpResults</a>(Builder, Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ScaleFactor = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a7704bf68951054ffeb3efe605750e2d9">CreateNeg</a>(FrexpExp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Rcp = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9ac45fd1485e6735d83544e54fb52d4b">CreateUnaryIntrinsic</a>(Intrinsic::amdgcn&#95;rcp, FrexpMant);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Optimize fdiv with rcp:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;rcp&#95;f16 and v&#95;rsq&#95;f16 DO support denormals.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimize with fdiv.fast:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a/b -&gt; fdiv.fast(a, b) when !fpmath &gt;= 2.5ulp with denormals flushed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Figure out how many bits are really needed for this division.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p MaxDivBits is an optimization hint to bypass the second</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ComputeNumSignBits/computeKnownBits call if the first one is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// insufficient.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a5d6281f602a2d61050f8e8214c34b16e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a5d6281f602a2d61050f8e8214c34b16e">AMDGPUCodeGenPrepareImpl::getDivNumBits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Num,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Den,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxDivBits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSigned)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Num-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">         Den-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SSBits = Num-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsSigned) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RHSSignBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad46ed333b920b20e78d948610366254c">ComputeNumSignBits</a>(Den, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ad6fa8252711b6da609826cdf5f7076b2">DL</a>, 0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#af2afde5f3a04ce2c576e01f9a8396ba9">AC</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A sign bit needs to be reserved for shrinking.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DivBits = SSBits - RHSSignBits + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DivBits &gt; MaxDivBits)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SSBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHSSignBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad46ed333b920b20e78d948610366254c">ComputeNumSignBits</a>(Num, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ad6fa8252711b6da609826cdf5f7076b2">DL</a>, 0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#af2afde5f3a04ce2c576e01f9a8396ba9">AC</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SignBits = std::min(LHSSignBits, RHSSignBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DivBits = SSBits - SignBits + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DivBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a> = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#add2225af2af25968f26ed4cb0db94dbe">CreateXor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, SignY);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm here is based on ideas from &quot;Software Integer Division&quot;, Tom</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rodeheffer, August 2008</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unsigned udiv(unsigned x, unsigned y) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // Initial estimate of inv(y). The constant is less than 2^32 to ensure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // that this is a lower bound on inv(y), even if some of the calculations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // round up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   unsigned z = (unsigned)((4294967296.0 - 512.0) &#42; v&#95;rcp&#95;f32((float)y));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // One round of UNR (Unsigned integer Newton-Raphson) to improve z.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // Empirically this is guaranteed to give a &quot;two-y&quot; lower bound on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // inv(y).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   z += umulh(z, -y &#42; z);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // Quotient/remainder estimate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   unsigned q = umulh(x, z);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   unsigned r = x - q &#42; y;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // Two rounds of quotient/remainder refinement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (r &gt;= y) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ++q;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     r -= y;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (r &gt;= y) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ++q;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     r -= y;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   return q;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initial estimate of inv(y).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;FloatY = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5d0b7f11d28f823b8323344d84d63f03">CreateUIToFP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, F32Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RcpY = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a80eec4efbded89b11092babf42a65b82">CreateIntrinsic</a>(Intrinsic::amdgcn&#95;rcp, F32Ty, &#123;FloatY&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;Scale = ConstantFP::get(F32Ty, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aab3863f16cb0767af49f0dd63bc5aa90">llvm::bit&#95;cast&lt;float&gt;</a>(0x4F7FFFFE));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ScaledY = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ae33cfb24f8bc0f6aa80c3a49e3769f6d">CreateFMul</a>(RcpY, Scale);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Z = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4cac1c8f9a62a9d1079e4d0499bbb848">CreateFPToUI</a>(ScaledY, I32Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One round of UNR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NegY = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a92c83e803f2cf22906da0aaec44ff6d7">CreateSub</a>(Zero, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NegYZ = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aecd40f9a16dc0ef1e0bc416599f89277">CreateMul</a>(NegY, Z);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Z = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aada1d6d8de104a5cd1cb9a02c676cc6c">CreateAdd</a>(Z, <a href="#a7359be3b94f25d09f84ce7d6dbad5c34">getMulHu</a>(Builder, Z, NegYZ));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Quotient/remainder estimate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Q = <a href="#a7359be3b94f25d09f84ce7d6dbad5c34">getMulHu</a>(Builder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, Z);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;R = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a92c83e803f2cf22906da0aaec44ff6d7">CreateSub</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aecd40f9a16dc0ef1e0bc416599f89277">CreateMul</a>(Q, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First quotient/remainder refinement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ac613fa8e66fca464885c3f274fbeb834">CreateICmpUGE</a>(R, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  R = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a49b228f797f9b3563256da446100c3ac">CreateSelect</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a92c83e803f2cf22906da0aaec44ff6d7">CreateSub</a>(R, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>), R);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ac613fa8e66fca464885c3f274fbeb834">CreateICmpUGE</a>(R, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All elements covered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EltsCovered.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a75146e730671c449f870a97db0cbfc6d">all</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We either didn&#39;t find a single insertelement, or the insertelement chain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ended before all elements were covered. Check for other interesting values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Constants are always interesting because we can just constant fold the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extractelements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(CurVal))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shufflevector is likely to be profitable if either operand is a constant,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or if either source is in the same block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is because shufflevector is most often lowered as a series of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert/extract elements anyway.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ShuffleVectorInst&gt;</a>(CurVal)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(SV-&gt;getOperand(1)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1807"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="#afaaa8653fb76c3493a27777d56945e4e">areInSameBB</a>(SV, SV-&gt;getOperand(0)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1808"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="#afaaa8653fb76c3493a27777d56945e4e">areInSameBB</a>(SV, SV-&gt;getOperand(1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1810"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1812"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;It, Inserted&#93; = SeenPHIs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Inserted)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1818"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Inc : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.incoming&#95;values()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1821"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PhiInc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(Inc))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a473885e550a15e1490b4de7f4ebd245f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a473885e550a15e1490b4de7f4ebd245f">AMDGPUCodeGenPrepareImpl::canBreakPHINode</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check in the cache first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a0e35c50e56716a12652b406bb7364b68">BreakPhiNodesCache</a>.find(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><span class="doxyHighlight">      It != <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a0e35c50e56716a12652b406bb7364b68">BreakPhiNodesCache</a>.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We consider PHI nodes as part of &quot;chains&quot;, so given a PHI node I, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recursively consider all its users and incoming values that are also PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes. We then make a decision about all of those PHIs at once. Either they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all get broken up, or none of them do. That way, we avoid cases where a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// single PHI is/is not broken and we end up reforming/exploding a vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple times, or even worse, doing it in a loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const PHINode &#42;, 8&gt;</a> WorkList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#af65e37f8e20df039d3dbbb10977b9bc5">collectPHINodes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, WorkList);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that none of the PHI nodes in the worklist are in the map. If some of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them are, it means we&#39;re not good enough at collecting related PHIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;WLP : WorkList) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a0e35c50e56716a12652b406bb7364b68">BreakPhiNodesCache</a>.count(WLP) == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To consider a PHI profitable to break, we need to see some interesting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// incoming values. At least 2/3rd (rounded up) of all PHIs in the worklist</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must have one to consider all PHIs breakable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This threshold has been determined through performance testing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that the computation below is equivalent to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (unsigned)ceil((K / 3.0) &#42; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s simply written this way to avoid mixing integral/FP arithmetic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Threshold = (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() &#42; 2, 3) / 3);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumBreakablePHIs = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CanBreak = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;Cur : WorkList) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t break PHIs that have no interesting incoming values. That is, where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is no clear opportunity to fold the &quot;extractelement&quot; instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we would add.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: IC does not run after this pass, so we&#39;re only interested in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// foldings that the DAG combiner can do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(Cur-&gt;incoming&#95;values(), <a href="#a77de311a4aa9ca492ad4fd8e6a363186">isInterestingPHIIncomingValue</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (++NumBreakablePHIs &gt;= Threshold) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CanBreak = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;Cur : WorkList)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a0e35c50e56716a12652b406bb7364b68">BreakPhiNodesCache</a>&#91;Cur&#93; = CanBreak;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CanBreak;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper class for &quot;break large PHIs&quot; (visitPHINode).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This represents a slice of a PHI&#39;s incoming value, which is made up of:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - The type of the slice (Ty)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - The index in the incoming value&#39;s vector where the slice starts (Idx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - The number of elements in the slice (NumElts).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It also keeps track of the NewPHI node inserted for this particular slice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Slice examples:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;4 x i64&gt; -&gt; Split into four i64 slices.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     -&gt; &#91;i64, 0, 1&#93;, &#91;i64, 1, 1&#93;, &#91;i64, 2, 1&#93;, &#91;i64, 3, 1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &lt;5 x i16&gt; -&gt; Split into 2 &lt;2 x i16&gt; slices + a i16 tail.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     -&gt; &#91;&lt;2 x i16&gt;, 0, 2&#93;, &#91;&lt;2 x i16&gt;, 2, 2&#93;, &#91;i16, 4, 1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#abcfe9b938404c5c07c3c426aca33199b">VectorSlice</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Slice \\p Inc according to the information contained within this slice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is cached, so if called multiple times for the same \\p BB &amp; \\p Inc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// pair, it returns the same Sliced value as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note this &#42;intentionally&#42; does not return the same value for, say,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#91;%bb.0, %0&#93; &amp; &#91;%bb.1, %0&#93; as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - It could cause issues with dominance (e.g. if bb.1 is seen first, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   the value in bb.1 may not be reachable from bb.0 if it&#39;s its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   predecessor.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - We also want to make our extract instructions as local as possible so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   the DAG has better chances of folding them out. Duplicating them like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   that is beneficial in that regard.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is both a minor optimization to avoid creating duplicate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions, but also a requirement for correctness. It is not forbidden</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for a PHI node to have the same &#91;BB, Val&#93; pair multiple times. If we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// returned a new value each time, those previously identical pairs would all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// have different incoming values (from the same block) and it&#39;d cause a &quot;PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// node has multiple entries for the same basic block with different incoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// values!&quot; verifier error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#aef12c412e54fb31aa597199eadc0e866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#aef12c412e54fb31aa597199eadc0e866">getSlicedVal</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Inc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> NewValName) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;Res = SlicedVals&#91;&#123;BB, Inc&#125;&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Res)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;IncInst = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(Inc))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.SetCurrentDebugLocation(IncInst-&gt;getDebugLoc());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350">NumElts</a> &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 4&gt;</a> Mask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> K = <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a>; K &lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350">NumElts</a>); ++K)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Mask.push&#95;back(K);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Res = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateShuffleVector(Inc, Mask, NewValName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Res = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateExtractElement(Inc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a>, NewValName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;std::pair&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, Value &#42;&gt;</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&gt; SlicedVals;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#aef67bcdb0247f9b4b984725fa065e1ce"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#aef67bcdb0247f9b4b984725fa065e1ce">AMDGPUCodeGenPrepareImpl::visitPHINode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Break-up fixed-vector PHIs into smaller pieces.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default threshold is 32, so it breaks up any vector that&#39;s &gt;32 bits into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its elements, or into 32-bit pieces (for 8/16 bit elts).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is only helpful for DAGISel because it doesn&#39;t handle large PHIs as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// well as GlobalISel. DAGISel lowers PHIs by using CopyToReg/CopyFromReg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With large, odd-sized PHIs we may end up needing many &#96;build&#95;vector&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations with most elements being &quot;undef&quot;. This inhibits a lot of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimization opportunities and can result in unreasonably high register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pressure and the inevitable stack spilling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/#a1dff2a9feda65e02c09974c544c8c4ff">BreakLargePHIs</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aff30786f1ea13c3ea475acce504571e4">getCGPassBuilderOption</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/targetpassconfig-cpp/#a96ee83741efbaafdb0df1eb8eff27d1b">EnableGlobalISelOption</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42;FVT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FVT || FVT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#a1893caf878859959ba6a3d5442ef1439">getNumElements</a>() == 1 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ad6fa8252711b6da609826cdf5f7076b2">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(FVT) &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/#a6ccf25014466f5d87fe3971cc9f060aa">BreakLargePHIsThreshold</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/#acd5e4cd8d0b926539e5d784be7234af4">ForceBreakLargePHIs</a> &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a473885e550a15e1490b4de7f4ebd245f">canBreakPHINode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;VectorSlice&gt; Slices;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;EltTy = FVT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#afdce715c901d62e2c1367a0ff5248175">getElementType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 8/16 bits type, don&#39;t scalarize fully but break it up into as many</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32-bit slices as we can, and scalarize the tail.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EltSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ad6fa8252711b6da609826cdf5f7076b2">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(EltTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts = FVT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#a1893caf878859959ba6a3d5442ef1439">getNumElements</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EltSize == 8 || EltSize == 16) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SubVecSize = (32 / EltSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;SubVecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(EltTy, SubVecSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> End = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41896492f62ee8d25cf8aaad70bd88aa">alignDown</a>(NumElts, SubVecSize); Idx &lt; End;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">           Idx += SubVecSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Slices.emplace&#95;back(SubVecTy, Idx, SubVecSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scalarize all remaining elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; Idx &lt; NumElts; ++Idx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Slices.emplace&#95;back(EltTy, Idx, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Slices.size() &gt; 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create one PHI per vector piece. The &quot;VectorSlice&quot; class takes care of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// creating the necessary instruction to extract the relevant slices of each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// incoming value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getParent());</span></CodeLine>
